description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 18/16123/FUL (Demolition of the former NHS Trust Site and erection of a three storey building with set back fourth floor providing 49 new homes, comprising 17 x 1 bed, 22 x 2 bed and 10 x 3 bed, proposed basement accommodating 30 car parking spaces, 84 cycle parking spaces and landscaping at ground floor) dated 28/09/2018. Amendments to include 1) omission of Juliet balconies along North (South Place) elevation 2) addition of basement smoke vent to West (Warwick Grove) elevation 3) addition of automated gate to top of basement car park access ramp (West/Warwick Grove elevation) 4) change of balcony balustrade finish for balconies within courtyard and East elevation from glass to powder coated steel 5) Details of fans, vents, louvres and ducts added to elevations 6) Minor fenestration and boundary treatment updates
